theUnchainedMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theUnchainedMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theUnchainedMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theUnchainedMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theUnchainedMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theUnchainedMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
theUnchainedMod:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theUnchainedMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theUnchainedMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theUnchainedMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.NAME: Unshackling
theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.
theUnchainedMod:Unshackling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play a card, Upgrade it for the rest of combat.

theUnchainedMod:Whiplash.NAME: Whiplash
theUnchainedMod:Whiplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Enemy loses !M! HP.

theUnchainedMod:HeartfeltSpeech.NAME: Heartfelt Speech
theUnchainedMod:HeartfeltSpeech.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain 1 Intangible.

theUnchainedMod:FullSwing.NAME: Full Swing
theUnchainedMod:FullSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:QuickSwing.NAME: Quick Swing
theUnchainedMod:QuickSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Draw !M! cards.

theUnchainedMod:StepBack.NAME: Step Back
theUnchainedMod:StepBack.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Gain !B! Block.

theUnchainedMod:MakeRoom.NAME: Make Room
theUnchainedMod:MakeRoom.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL If you have no Block, gain [E].
theUnchainedMod:MakeRoom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL If you have no Block, gain [E] [E].

theUnchainedMod:PropheticSwing.NAME: Prophetic Swing
theUnchainedMod:PropheticSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Scry !M!.

theUnchainedMod:SoulConjunction.NAME: Soul Conjunction
theUnchainedMod:SoulConjunction.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. NL Enemy loses HP equal to ALL damage done to HP and theunchainedmod:Relay. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am already tied to this enemy.

theUnchainedMod:Liberation.NAME: Liberation
theUnchainedMod:Liberation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Finish ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains. NL Remove ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:ChainFlourish.NAME: Chain Flourish
theUnchainedMod:ChainFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Playing 2-cost cards reduce the cost of this card by [E]. Enemy loses !M! HP. NL Set Cost to 4 after playing.

theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.NAME: Cruiserweight
theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a 2-cost card, draw 1 card.
theUnchainedMod:Cruiserweight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a 2-cost card, draw 2 cards.

theUnchainedMod:Kusarigama.NAME: Kusarigama
theUnchainedMod:Kusarigama.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if it finishes an Attack theunchainedmod:Chain. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need to finish an Attack Chain with this.

theUnchainedMod:KeepDistance.NAME: Keep Distance
theUnchainedMod:KeepDistance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ALL enemies gain !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.NAME: Muscle Memory
theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2-cost card is played twice.
theUnchainedMod:MuscleMemory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next 2 2-cost cards are played twice.

theUnchainedMod:Reschedule.NAME: Reschedule
theUnchainedMod:Reschedule.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you would take next turn. ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you would take this turn, is dealt to you next turn.

theUnchainedMod:FractalShield.NAME: Fractal Shield
theUnchainedMod:FractalShield.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage hits theunchainedmod:Relay before HP.
theUnchainedMod:FractalShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage hits theunchainedmod:Relay before HP.

theUnchainedMod:Windup.NAME: Windup
theUnchainedMod:Windup.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Chain: Add a random common Attack to your hand. NL It exhausts. It costs zero this turn.
theUnchainedMod:Windup.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Chain: Add a random upgraded common Attack to your hand. NL It exhausts. It costs zero this turn.

theUnchainedMod:Aplomb.NAME: Aplomb
theUnchainedMod:Aplomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL Next Turn, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:Swirl.NAME: Swirl
theUnchainedMod:Swirl.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Retain. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Full_Spin. Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Swirl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Retain. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Momentum and 1 theunchainedmod:Full_Spin. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:RoyalDecree.NAME: Royal Decree
theUnchainedMod:RoyalDecree.DESCRIPTION: Add a random 2-cost card into your hand. It costs !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Claustrophobia.NAME: Claustrophobia
theUnchainedMod:Claustrophobia.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply !M! theunchainedmod:Dented_Armor to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:SolarPlexus.NAME: Solar Plexus
theUnchainedMod:SolarPlexus.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !M! theunchainedmod:Chain: Stun. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Burnish.NAME: Burnish
theUnchainedMod:Burnish.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Gain theunchainedmod:Momentum equal to double its cost.

theUnchainedMod:SharePain.NAME: Share Pain
theUnchainedMod:SharePain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you have gained this combat.
theUnchainedMod:SharePain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain. NL Damage is equal to ALL theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage you have gained this combat.

theUnchainedMod:Overexertion.NAME: Overexertion
theUnchainedMod:Overexertion.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Overexertion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Ballet.NAME: Ballet
theUnchainedMod:Ballet.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL Swirls now hit ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:OverHeadSwing.NAME: Over Head Swing
theUnchainedMod:OverHeadSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain end your turn.

theUnchainedMod:SingleOut.NAME: Single Out
theUnchainedMod:SingleOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL A random enemy gains !M! Block.

theUnchainedMod:RelentlessOnslaught.NAME: Relentless Onslaught
theUnchainedMod:RelentlessOnslaught.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Deal !D! damage !M! times and reapply this theunchainedmod:Chain. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:RoyalAssessment.NAME: Royal Assessment
theUnchainedMod:RoyalAssessment.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for every enemy that is blocking.
theUnchainedMod:RoyalAssessment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] if ALL enemies are blocking and [E] for every enemy that is blocking.

theUnchainedMod:Cocoon.NAME: Cocoon
theUnchainedMod:Cocoon.DESCRIPTION: theunchainedmod:Relay !M! damage. Your theunchainedmod:Relay does not wear off at the start of next turn.

theUnchainedMod:PsychicSwing.NAME: Psychic Swing
theUnchainedMod:PsychicSwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Remove up to !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage and deal damage equal to the amount you removed.

theUnchainedMod:Baguazhang.NAME: Baguazhang
theUnchainedMod:Baguazhang.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to do less than !M! damage, Block !B!.

theUnchainedMod:MagusForm.NAME: Magus Form
theUnchainedMod:MagusForm.DESCRIPTION: ALL 2-cost cards cost zero once per turn.
theUnchainedMod:MagusForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL 2-cost cards cost zero and are upgraded once per turn.

theUnchainedMod:TelekineticPulse.NAME: Telekinetic Pulse
theUnchainedMod:TelekineticPulse.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block. 2 theunchainedmod:Chain: ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

theUnchainedMod:KineticCopy.NAME: Kinetic Copy
theUnchainedMod:KineticCopy.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the amount of Block ALL enemies have.
theUnchainedMod:KineticCopy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to double the amount of Block ALL enemies have.

theUnchainedMod:ThePrincesGrace.NAME: The Prince's Grace
theUnchainedMod:ThePrincesGrace.DESCRIPTION: At the start of turn, draw !M! additional cards. All enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block every turn.
theUnchainedMod:ThePrincesGrace.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of turn, draw !M! additional cards. All enemies gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Block every turn.

theUnchainedMod:Cuff.NAME: Cuff
theUnchainedMod:Cuff.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Apply !M! Weak. Retain. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Premonition.NAME: Premonition
theUnchainedMod:Premonition.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you end this turn on 0 [E] , gain [E] [E] next turn.
theUnchainedMod:Premonition.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you end this turn on 0 [E] , gain NL [E] [E] [E] next turn.

theUnchainedMod:Pirouette.NAME: Pirouette
theUnchainedMod:Pirouette.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum. NL Upgrade ALL Swirls in your hand. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:InfiniteChain.NAME: Infinite Chain
theUnchainedMod:InfiniteChain.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. theunchainedmod:Link. NL Next turn, add an Infinite Chain into your Hand. Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:InfiniteChain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Ethereal. theunchainedmod:Link. NL Next turn, add an Infinite Chain into your Hand. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:TradeOffer.NAME: Trade Offer
theUnchainedMod:TradeOffer.DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Block. NL Draw !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! card.
theUnchainedMod:TradeOffer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy gains !M! Block. NL Draw !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! cards.

theUnchainedMod:FouettéEnTournant.NAME: Fouetté En Tournant
theUnchainedMod:FouettéEnTournant.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 theunchainedmod:Momentum X times. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Ceasefire.NAME: Ceasefire
theUnchainedMod:Ceasefire.DESCRIPTION: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Ceasefire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Double your theunchainedmod:Relay. Double the Block of ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:Suffocate.NAME: Suffocate
theUnchainedMod:Suffocate.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses HP equal to double their Block.

theUnchainedMod:ThreadOfAriadne.NAME: Thread Of Ariadne
theUnchainedMod:ThreadOfAriadne.DESCRIPTION: If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:ThreadOfAriadne.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have an active Chain, take an extra turn after this turn. End your turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need an active Chain to play this.

theUnchainedMod:LawOfInertia.NAME: Law Of Inertia
theUnchainedMod:LawOfInertia.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, lose !M! Strength and Dexterity. Whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Strength and Dexterity.

theUnchainedMod:LastResort.NAME: Last Resort
theUnchainedMod:LastResort.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Gain [E] [E]. !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Chain: Lose ALL your [E]. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:ChainSaw.NAME: Chain Saw
theUnchainedMod:ChainSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Delete ALL your active theunchainedmod:Chains.

theUnchainedMod:ReinforcedLink.NAME: Reinforced Link
theUnchainedMod:ReinforcedLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have an active theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

theUnchainedMod:Prophecy.NAME: Prophecy
theUnchainedMod:Prophecy.DESCRIPTION: Copy a card and put the copy on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theUnchainedMod:Prophecy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy a card twice and put both copies on top of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:Riposte.NAME: Riposte
theUnchainedMod:Riposte.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:Glare.NAME: Glare
theUnchainedMod:Glare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:GraspIntoFuture.NAME: Grasp Into Future
theUnchainedMod:GraspIntoFuture.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Put !M! card from your draw pile on top of your draw pile.

theUnchainedMod:KeepSwinging.NAME: Keep Swinging
theUnchainedMod:KeepSwinging.DESCRIPTION: All Cards with "Swing" in their name deal !M! additional damage.

theUnchainedMod:EyeForAnEye.NAME: Eye For An Eye
theUnchainedMod:EyeForAnEye.DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! theunchainedmod:Relayed_Damage. Gain Vigor equal to the amount you removed.

theUnchainedMod:DefensiveLink.NAME: Defensive Link
theUnchainedMod:DefensiveLink.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Reduce the cost of a card by 1 this turn.

theUnchainedMod:ChaseDestiny.NAME: Chase Destiny
theUnchainedMod:ChaseDestiny.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you finish a theunchainedmod:Chain, gain [E]. Exhaust.

theUnchainedMod:StareDown.NAME: Stare Down
theUnchainedMod:StareDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! temporary Dexterity. 1 theunchainedmod:Chain: Apply !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! Weak to ALL enemies.

theUnchainedMod:CrushPlates.NAME: Crush Plates
theUnchainedMod:CrushPlates.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply theunchainedmod:Dented_Armor for ALL damage that was blocked.

theUnchainedMod:Wit.NAME: Wit
theUnchainedMod:Wit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card, if it is a 2-cost card play it on the same enemy if possible.

theUnchainedMod:Haste.NAME: Haste
theUnchainedMod:Haste.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, if it gives you theunchainedmod:Momentum, draw another card. NL Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Momentum.
theUnchainedMod:Haste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card, if it gives you theunchainedmod:Momentum, play it and draw another card. NL Gain !theUnchainedMod:SecondMagic! theunchainedmod:Momentum.

theUnchainedMod:PerfectStep.NAME: Perfect Step
theUnchainedMod:PerfectStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain. Gain 1 theunchainedmod:Full_Spin. Exhaust.
